item.title: Javascript cookie objects using Prototype and JSON
item.description: It’s sometime useful to interact with cookies directly on the client-side using javascript. This can be useful for a variety of situations, such as persisting display settings between page requests without storing anything on the server. I’ve also used them to display a simple welcome message to new visitors. It can make your controller code simpler if this kind of simple display logic is contained entirely on the client side.
